description: Configuration for Cant (cultural trade language) modifiers and fluency effects

None.NarrativeDescription: You cannot understand or speak this dialect. Cultural references and idioms are completely lost on you, and you may accidentally cause offense through linguistic ignorance.

Basic.NarrativeDescription: You can communicate basic ideas, but lack nuance. You understand literal meanings but miss subtext and cultural implications. You are clearly recognized as a learner or outsider.

Fluent.NarrativeDescription: You speak with native-level proficiency, understanding idioms, cultural references, and subtle implications. You can use appropriate honorifics and demonstrate cultural respect through language.

dvergr.Description: A precision language for craft and commerce. Every term has exact meaning, and ambiguity is considered sloppy thinking.
dvergr.NarrativeIntro: The Dvergr Trade-Tongue is like clockwork made of words - every syllable clicks into place with mechanical precision.

utgard.Description: A layered language where truth is hidden beneath acceptable deception. Every statement has surface and deeper meanings.
utgard.NarrativeIntro: Speaking Shadow-Tongue is like dancing in fog - what you say and what you mean waltz together but never quite touch.
KeyFeatures: Multiple layers of meaning in every phrase
Subtle distinctions between levels of deception

gorge-maw.Description: A resonant, tonal language requiring patience to parse. Extended vocalizations carry complex meanings through pitch and duration.
gorge-maw.NarrativeIntro: The Rumble flows like deep water through stone - slow, patient, and carrying more meaning than surface-dwellers can easily grasp.
KeyFeatures: Extended phrases that cannot be interrupted

rune-lupin.Description: A semi-telepathic communication that blends verbal and emotional elements. Requires mental openness to fully comprehend.
rune-lupin.NarrativeIntro: Mind-Speech is less speaking and more... feeling words into existence. Thoughts carry emotion; emotions carry meaning.
KeyFeatures: Pack hierarchy reflected in speech patterns
Mental state visible to fluent speakers

iron-bane.Description: Martial terminology and honor codes embedded in language. Words carry weight, and oaths once spoken are binding.
iron-bane.NarrativeIntro: War-Cant is forged like steel - every word hammered into shape carries the weight of blood and honor.

CommonPhrases.meaning: Debt that can only be paid in blood
Trustworthy to stand beside in battle
